languages.text: "Нижайше прошу прощения за дерзость, но какие доказательства есть у вас? Какие бы преступления нам не приписывали, в их числе нет тронопротивных мутаций! И я вынужден предупредить, что без боя мы не дадимся!"

"I humbly apologise for my impertinence, but the burden of proof lies on the accuser! Whatever crimes may be attributed to us, they do not include aberrant mutations! And I must warn you that we will not go down without a fight!"
languages.original_text: "Нижайше прошу прощения за дерзость, но какие доказательства есть у вас? Какие бы преступления нам не приписывали, в их числе нет тронопротивных мутаций! И я вынужден предупредить, что без боя мы не дадимся!"

traits.locale_text: "I humbly apologise for my impertinence, but the burden of proof lies on the accuser! Whatever crimes may be attributed to us, they do not include aberrant mutations! And I must warn you that we will not go down without a fight!"

"I humbly apologise for my impertinence, but the burden of proof lies on the accuser! Whatever crimes may be attributed to us, they do not include aberrant mutations! And I must warn you that we will not go down without a fight!"

languages.text: "Bitte verzeiht mir meine Impertinenz, aber die Last der Beweisführung liegt beim Ankläger. Egal, welche Verbrechen man uns vorwirft, abseitige Mutationen gehören nicht dazu! Außerdem muss ich Euch warnen, dass wir nicht kampflos untergehen werden!"
languages.original_text: "I humbly apologise for my impertinence, but the burden of proof lies on the accuser! Whatever crimes may be attributed to us, they do not include aberrant mutations! And I must warn you that we will not go down without a fight!"

traits.locale_text: "Bitte verzeiht mir meine Impertinenz, aber die Last der Beweisführung liegt beim Ankläger. Egal, welche Verbrechen man uns vorwirft, abseitige Mutationen gehören nicht dazu! Außerdem muss ich Euch warnen, dass wir nicht kampflos untergehen werden!"

languages.text: « Veuillez pardonner mon impertinence, mais c'est à l'accusation de fournir les preuves de ce qu'elle avance ! Quels que soient les crimes qu'on puisse nous imputer, les mutations aberrantes n'en font pas partie ! Et j'aime autant vous prévenir que nous ne nous rendrons pas sans combattre ! »
languages.original_text: "I humbly apologise for my impertinence, but the burden of proof lies on the accuser! Whatever crimes may be attributed to us, they do not include aberrant mutations! And I must warn you that we will not go down without a fight!"

traits.locale_text: « Veuillez pardonner mon impertinence, mais c'est à l'accusation de fournir les preuves de ce qu'elle avance ! Quels que soient les crimes qu'on puisse nous imputer, les mutations aberrantes n'en font pas partie ! Et j'aime autant vous prévenir que nous ne nous rendrons pas sans combattre ! »

languages.text: «¡Le ruego humildemente que perdone mi impertinencia, pero quien lanza la acusación es quien ha de presentar pruebas! ¡Aunque no estemos exentos de delitos, la mutación aberrante no figura entre ellos! ¡Y me veo en la obligación de advertirle que no nos rendiremos sin luchar!».
languages.original_text: "I humbly apologise for my impertinence, but the burden of proof lies on the accuser! Whatever crimes may be attributed to us, they do not include aberrant mutations! And I must warn you that we will not go down without a fight!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Le ruego humildemente que perdone mi impertinencia, pero quien lanza la acusación es quien ha de presentar pruebas! ¡Aunque no estemos exentos de delitos, la mutación aberrante no figura entre ellos! ¡Y me veo en la obligación de advertirle que no nos rendiremos sin luchar!».

languages.text: 「無礼については謹んでお詫びいたしますが、立証責任は告発者にあります！我々にどんな罪があろうとも、アベラント変異体は含まれておりません！警告させていただきますが、我々は戦わずして倒れることはありません！」
languages.original_text: "I humbly apologise for my impertinence, but the burden of proof lies on the accuser! Whatever crimes may be attributed to us, they do not include aberrant mutations! And I must warn you that we will not go down without a fight!"

traits.locale_text: 「無礼については謹んでお詫びいたしますが、立証責任は告発者にあります！我々にどんな罪があろうとも、アベラント変異体は含まれておりません！警告させていただきますが、我々は戦わずして倒れることはありません！」

languages.text: “我谦卑地为我的无礼道歉，但谁主张，谁举证！我们可能确实犯过罪，但我们绝对不是什么畸形的变种人！我必须警告您，如果您打算动手，我们绝对不会不战而降！”
languages.original_text: "I humbly apologise for my impertinence, but the burden of proof lies on the accuser! Whatever crimes may be attributed to us, they do not include aberrant mutations! And I must warn you that we will not go down without a fight!"

traits.locale_text: “我谦卑地为我的无礼道歉，但谁主张，谁举证！我们可能确实犯过罪，但我们绝对不是什么畸形的变种人！我必须警告您，如果您打算动手，我们绝对不会不战而降！”

languages.text: "Küstahlığımdan dolayı tüm içtenliğimle özür dilerim ama kanıt gösterme mesuliyeti, itham edene aittir! Bize ne tür suçlar atfederseniz atfedin, hiçbiri inhiraf mutasyonları kapsamıyor! Ayrıca savaşmadan pes etmeyeceğimize dair sizleri uyarmam gerek!"
languages.original_text: "I humbly apologise for my impertinence, but the burden of proof lies on the accuser! Whatever crimes may be attributed to us, they do not include aberrant mutations! And I must warn you that we will not go down without a fight!"
